goal.en: “By observation and recording of field geological phenomenon, so that students can learn about the state of the region‘s geological,Including the rock types of the exposed rock strata arrangement.“
goal.ch: “藉由野外地質現象的觀察與記錄，使學生可以了解一地區的地質狀態，包括出露岩層的岩石種類、岩層的排列方式等“

content.en: “Use of semester three weekends, go to the northeast corner (Makelele - Longdong), Mingde Reservoir, Taichung Tai Hang measurement of geological structure, making geological map stratigraphic column. Semester in five days time, go to Tainan County - the vicinity of the Nanhua Reservoir, grouping engaged in geological survey and maping.“
content.ch: 利用學期中的三個週末，分別前往東北角(萊萊-龍洞)、明德水庫、台中大坑等地量測地質構造、製作地質路線圖與地層柱狀圖。學期中，以5天的時間，赴台南玉井--南化水庫一帶，分組從事地質調查與測繪。

textbook.en: “2. Barnes, J.W., Lisle, R. J. (2004) Basic Geological Mapping (4th edition). John Wiley ＆ Sons, 184 pp.3. Compton, R.R., (1985) Geology in the Field: John Wiley ＆ Son, 416 pp.“
textbook.ch: “1. 陳培源 (1993) 野外及礦業地質學(第二版), 正中書局, 580 pp.“
